meta.title: e-commerce - Community marketplace
meta.description: A community-first multi-vendor marketplace with independent storefronts, updates, and EU-compliant checkout.

hero.title: Discover independent sellers and shop together
hero.subtitle: One payment, sub-orders per seller, bilingual support, and compliant fulfilment tailored for Poland and the EU.

features.heading: Built for modern Polish and European sellers

cards.title: Multi-seller checkout
cards.description: Split orders per seller with a single pay-in, ready for PLN payments and manual reconciliation.

cards.title: Realtime community
cards.description: Threads, DMs, and store updates keep buyers engaged and accountable. Moderation queue included.

cards.title: Compliance-first
cards.description: GDPR-ready data flows, Omnibus disclosures, rate limiting, and audit trails from day zero.

marketplace.description: Browse the curated catalog across sellers and filter by categories, price, and availability.
marketplace.hint: Marketplace catalog will launch alongside the product module.

stories.description: Follow store updates and community highlights to stay in sync with new drops.
stories.hint: Store updates feed is coming soon.

contractors.description: Discover specialists open to collaborations that help stores grow faster.
contractors.hint: Contractor discovery tools are planned for the next iteration.

login.description: Access orders, messages, and moderation tools after a secure sign-in flow.
login.hint: Supabase-backed login screen will ship soon.

signup.description: Register as a buyer or seller and become part of the e-commerce community.
signup.hint: Email-verified sign-up flow is coming shortly.

admin.description: Manage catalog, orders, team members, and buyer conversations from one console.
admin.hint: Seller console with moderation and fulfilment ships in the next milestone.

stores.description: Meet independent stores, their product lines, and the teams behind them.
stores.hint: Store index and filters will go live with the catalog release.

legalPrivacy.description: Understand how we process personal data under GDPR and local regulations.
legalPrivacy.hint: Full privacy policy draft lands with the compliance milestone.

legalTerms.description: Review the platform terms, seller responsibilities, and buyer rights.
legalTerms.hint: Finalised terms will ship after legal review.

legalReturns.description: Learn about returns and complaint procedures aligned with EU directives.
legalReturns.hint: Returns workflow will launch together with orders and fulfilment.

success.title: Thank you for your order
success.description: Stripe confirmed your payment. Sub-orders for each seller are now being prepared.
success.nextSteps: We sent a confirmation email with the order reference and we'll notify you about shipping updates.

cancel.title: Checkout not completed
cancel.description: The Stripe session was closed before payment. Your cart is still saved.
cancel.nextSteps: You can resume checkout whenever you're ready. Contact support if you were charged.

directory.title: Find trusted contractors
directory.subtitle: Browse vetted specialists ready to help with growth, fulfilment, and store operations across Poland and the EU.
directory.error: We couldn't load the directory right now. Please try again.
directory.emptyDescription: Adjust the filters or check back soon - new specialists join the marketplace every week.

tasks.title: My Tasks workspace
tasks.description: This space will host briefs from store owners, scope discussions, and secure file hand-offs for contractors.
tasks.hint: Task management for contractors ships with the collaboration milestone (M3).

storefront.metaDescriptionFallback: Browse products from this independent store on our community marketplace.
storefront.productNotFoundDescription: The product may be unpublished or removed by the seller.
storefront.productListDescription: Explore the latest published products from this seller.
storefront.emptyStateDescription: The seller has not published products yet. Please check back soon.
storefront.mediaPlaceholderHint: Seller has not uploaded images yet.
storefront.followHint: Follow now to receive store updates once messaging launches.
storefront.descriptionFallback: The seller has not provided additional details yet.
